about_the_game:
This set includes all 17 of the Flower costumes.
These costumes do not include destructible functionality.

Costumes for the following characters included:
Kasumi, Ayane, Tina, Leifang, Hitomi, Kokoro, Helena, Lisa, Mila, Christie, Momiji, Rachel, Marie Rose, Phase 4, Nyotengu, Honoka, and Naotora Ii.

*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
*You must purchase the character Naotora Ii separately before using content for her.
*The Fireworks stage shown in the screenshots cannot be used in this version of the game.
detailed_description:
NOTICE

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.


About the Game

This set includes all 17 of the Flower costumes. These costumes do not include destructible functionality. Costumes for the following characters included: Kasumi, Ayane, Tina, Leifang, Hitomi, Kokoro, Helena, Lisa, Mila, Christie, Momiji, Rachel, Marie Rose, Phase 4, Nyotengu, Honoka, and Naotora Ii. *You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content. *You must purchase the character Naotora Ii separately before using content for her. *The Fireworks stage shown in the screenshots cannot be used in this version of the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
